Klasse AppView

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.applayout.AppLayout
com.spirit.application.views.AppView
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.router.RouterLayout, Serializable
@CssImport("./themes/spirit/views/AppView.css") @Route("main/") public class AppView extends com.vaadin.flow.component.applayout.AppLayout
Main view of the application extending AppLayout. It sets up the UI with a side navigation menu, a header with a logout button, and a footer. The view content changes dynamically based on the user role (either Student or Company).

Annotations:

  • @Route: Specifies the route URL for this view, mapped to Globals.Pages.APP.
  • @CssImport: Imports custom CSS for styling the view components.
Siehe auch:
  • Serialisierte Form
